name: Suyaris
description:
Premise

Welcome to the 17th Annual Whiplash Games, an obstacle course tournament which is centered around full movement. Many talented individuals enter the games to prove their worth and to bring glory to their people. Are you capable of completing the course, or will you fall through the cracks?

Controls Keyboard and Mouse

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

E - Dash

Hold LMB - Grapple

Release LMB - Ungrapple

Gamepad

Left Stick - Movement

Bottom Face Button - Jump

Right Trigger - Dash

Hold Right Shoulder - Grapple

Release Right Shoulder - Grapple

Notice about Development

Suyaris is a proof of concept developed by a team of students. This game may be further developed, abandoned or have any mechanics redeveloped into an entirely new project unrelated to Suyaris.
